title: Stocks to Watch: Bharti Airtel, Vedanta, TCS, HDFC Bank, L&T Finance Holdings - Mint
content: Stocks to Watch: Bharti Airtel, Vedanta, TCS, HDFC Bank, L&T Finance Holdings  Mint
description: Escorts, and Punjab National Bank are under the F&O ban for 22 February. Securities in the ban period under the F&O segment include companies in which the security has crossed 95% of the market-wide position limit
